articles.title: Protesters defy curfew across Sri Lanka amid economic crisis: Top developments - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: NEW DELHI: Opposition lawmakers in Sri Lanka on Sunday marched in the capital, Colombo, defying President Gotabaya Rajapaksa's move to impose a nation.
